amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit funds for any salaries or expenses for the offices of the Special Envoy for Guantanamo Detention Closure or the Principal Director, Detainee Policy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 34 printed in House Report 114-623 to prohibit funds for any salaries or expenses for the offices of the Special Envoy for Guantanamo Detention Closure or the Principal Director, Detainee Policy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeSantis amendment (A033) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 194 (Roll no. 324).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeSantis amendment (A033) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 194 (Roll no. 324).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A033) offered by Mr. DeSantis.
